page.description: Fetch data to a Grid Component Data Object using a SQL Query.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = ToGridComponentDataObject(SQLStatement as C, [Arguments as SQL::Arguments,] DataArray as p[], FieldArray as p[] [, RowsToCopy = -1 as N [, StartRow = 1 as N ]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Arguments
argument.description: Optional. A SQL::Arguments object. One or more arguments to be resolved when the SELECT statement is executed.

argument.name: DataArray
argument.description: Optional. Pointer array. The DataArray argument will be initialized with current values.

argument.name: FieldArray
argument.description: Optional. Pointer array. The FieldArray argument will contain field information.

argument.name: RowsToCopy = -1
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (all). The number of rows to copy.

argument.name: StartRow = 1
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1 (first). The first row to copy.

section.note: You must dim the arrays first: DIM MyArray[1] as P

section.description: The ToGridComponentDataObject() method fetches data in a format suitable for a grid component using. Note: You must dim the arrays first.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim DataArray[0] as P dim FieldArray[0] as P dim conn as SQL::Connection dim cs as C dim str as C cs = "{A5API=Access, FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb', UserName='Admin'}" if .not. conn.open(cs) then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.ToGridComponentDataObject("select * from customer", DataArray, FieldArray) then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if str = property_to_string(dataarray) showvar(str) conn.close()

section.description: The str variable's contents look like this.
section.example: 1data1initial=1> current=1> IsNull=.F.> > 2TEXT=""> initial="Michael"> current="Michael"> IsNull=.F.> > 3TEXT=""> initial="Graham"> current="Graham"> IsNull=.F.> > ...
